textBox.richText: The term project for the Archaeology of the Medium class (MIAS 220) was to trace the development of a particular filming technology and then relate it to an aspect of current archival practice. For my project, I completed a website about Disney Animation filming technologies, and how they relate to their current restoration practices. Please click on the images below to enter two sample pages on the site. To return to the main portfolio site, click the back button on your browser.
